channel.title: VeracScape! {NOW HIRING!} Forums under Maintenance!
channel.description:
[center]VeracScape
[size=6]BE SURE TO REGISTER AT THE FORUMS IF YOU'RE HIRED! IF YOU JUST WANT TO BECOME A PART OF THIS, JUST JOIN![/size]
Remember to sign up for the Forums at veracscape.smfforfree3.com! Question? : Feel free to add me at MSN, as revan_eccles@hotmail.com. Or Post on my forums!
[b]Jobs[/b] ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hoster(s): ToxicX
Web designer : Julie
Coders: 1234ideclareathumbwar Inmate Super_m
Graphics : LoveScaper
Admins: EATALOT2002
Mods: omg hiyas pker4lifeXD
Client Designer:
Testers :
*Note* Testers will only begin "testing" when the server is better
Job Definitions: Hoster-Runs the server for the owner and hopefully, without hamachi.. Web Designer-Designs the website/new forums for the server. Graphics-Creates cool sigs, banners to use for the forums or for advertising. Coders-Make codes for the owner so the server can be better. Admins-Keeps server/forums in line. Mods-Same as above, just not as much power. Client Designer-Designs an official client for the server. Testers-Tests the server out before released to public and comments on how to make it better and how it is so far.
NOTE!!! ----------------------------------------------- If any of these jobs are you, and you want to help out apply for the position you want using this form!
EXAMPLE! Position Wanted:Coder Experience in this position:2 years Why I should hire you:Because I can do tons of cool stuff. Time availible to do this:About 7 hours a day.
Please help out! I can't begin development until I have a development team.
-Darth Mopar (Verac)[/center]

item.title: VeracScape! {NOW HIRING!} Forums under Maintenance!
item.dc:creator: @Ibehustlin247 Ibehustlin247
item.description:
@Ibehustlin247 wrote:

Position Wanted:Admin/Mod
Experience in this position:Quite a lot. Although I dont see as to how you would need experience for Admin/Mod. Most people will just post bullshit anyways.
Why I should hire you:Well, as of right now I have my own server, figured id try to help some other out. PROOF: cultivated.zapto.org is the IP my name is Matt/Matty on there, Our website is kasparscape.co.nr, only proof i have sorry.
Time availible to do this: Depends on a few things: If we are having problems on our source, wether or not we are updating our source that day. Atleast a good 3 hours Id be available in worst case senario, probably more.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @onebankai onebankai
item.description:
@onebankai wrote:

oh can i be a admin? im extremly responsible, and reliable… if not a mod?.

Position Wanted: Admin or Mod

Experience in this position: ive been a admin a couple of times mabe like 4 times for fourms, and ive been a mod many times,

Why I should hire you: im really good at spotting and reporting bugs right away, also im trustworthy,and i am a fast learner so i can do lots of things…, lastly i will not misuse rights becuase they can be taken away…
T
ime available to do this: any time im on the computer 1-3 hours normally, 5 hours absolute max becuase i got rest my eyes

why i want to be this position: i want to be in this postions because i really like to help people out and not blame people if their new…

oh btw i listen to people and i dont make rash decisions

if i do get either postion please pm me 8-D

p.s if none of the above i can be a tester ive been testing servers for awhile and i know what bugs are a big problem and little bugs which ppl dont notice
